text: Jabaki timi najikako kinarama thiyau, ra uniharu tadhako kinarama thi'e ra kaphila (manisaharuko samuha) timibhanda tala thiyo. Yadi timi apasama samaya niscita gareko bha'e, timi niscita samayama pugdainathyau. Tara allahale ta eka kama garnu nai thiyo jo niscita bha'isakeko thiyo, taki jasala'i nasta hunucha tyo spasta pramana dekhera nai vinasta hos ra jasala'i jivita rahanucha tyo spasta pramana dekhera jivita rahos. Nihsandeha allaha ramrari jandacha ra ramrari sundacha
